## About this Project *(English)*

Exploratory data analysis developed for the Data Organization and Presentation (GES109) course at UFLA. Investigated wildfire patterns in Brazil during May 2025 using open data from INPE, covering biome distribution, drought-fire risk relationship, and geographic patterns by state.
